markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Constant Levitation](/Feats.aspx?ID=3688) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Psychic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=430" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 29</row>

</column>

---

Your power has unbound you from the earth below. You're affected by a constant [_fly_](/Spells.aspx?ID=125) spell, and when your [Psyche is Unleashed](/Actions.aspx?ID=1222), you gain a +10-foot status bonus to your fly Speed.
name: Constant Levitation
